title: Payment Processing Error
description: Customer's credit card was declined despite having sufficient funds. They have tried multiple times and are unable to complete their purchase. The error message is '402: Payment Failed.'

title: Account Verification Issues
description: User is unable to verify their email address. They have requested the verification link multiple times but haven't received it in their inbox or spam folder.

title: Report Bug: Shopping Cart Glitch
description: When a customer adds an item to their cart, it shows up for a moment, then disappears. The issue seems to be inconsistent and affects different browsers.

title: Subscription Cancellation Problem
description: A customer is unable to cancel their subscription from their account settings. The 'Cancel Subscription' button is greyed out and they are still being charged.

title: Incorrect Product Information
description: The description for 'Product X' on the website lists the wrong dimensions. The customer has received the item and it does not fit their needs.

title: Website Not Loading on Mobile
description: A user reports that the website is not loading correctly on their iPhone 14. The page appears blank or is heavily distorted, making it unusable.

title: Password Reset Link Expired
description: A customer tried to reset their password but the link expired before they could use it. They need a new, valid link to access their account.

title: General Inquiry - Product Features
description: Customer is asking about the availability of a specific feature not listed on the product page. They want to know if it's planned for a future update.

title: Data Export Failure
description: A user tried to export their data in a CSV format but the download failed multiple times with an 'internal server error.'

title: Broken Image on Homepage
description: An image on the main banner of the homepage is not loading and is instead showing a broken file icon. This is affecting the site's overall appearance.
